title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.3 - Stewards at race meeting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.3 - Stewards at race meeting

State Regulations

There shall be three stewards to supervise each race
meeting. One or such stewards shall be the official steward of the commission, one shall be appointed by The Jockey Club or by the National Steeplechase and

Hunt Association, as may be appropriate, and one shall be appointed by the
corporation or association conducting such race meeting. Such stewards shall
exercise such powers and perform such duties at each race meeting as may be
prescribed by this Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
